In the MATTER OF the ESTATE OF Margaret S. JONES, Deceased, John A. Jones, Jr., Personal Representative, Appellant/Cross-Appellee-Defendant,
v.
Joyce E. Schaefer, Beneficiary, Appellee/Cross-Appellant-Plaintiff,
and
Suzanne D. VanGombos and Shar A. Windle, 1 Beneficiaries, Nominal Appellees-Defendants. Court of Appeals Case No. 29A04-1703-ES-584 Court of Appeals of Indiana. FILED December 21, 2017

DISPOSITION OF CASE BY UNPUBLISHED MEMORANDUM DECISION

KIRSCH , J.

Affirmed in part and reversed in part.

NAJAM, J., Concurs.

BROWN, J., Concurs.

1
